title: A CURIOUS TYPE: GRAPHIC DESIGN IN FILM
content:
Submitted by [kegler](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010813/http:/www.typophile.com/user/1334 "View user profile.") : 3.Apr.2008 5.33am 

A great [film series starts today at the George Eastman House](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010813/http:/dryden.eastmanhouse.org/program-highlights/a-curious-type-graphic-design-in-film/)/Dryden Theatre in Rochester.

George Eastman House Presents: A CURIOUS TYPE: GRAPHIC DESIGN IN FILM - Graphic design is an implicit part of the filmmaking process. It is often so implicit, however, as to become obscured by some of the flashier aspects of movies. For this series, we’re hoping to uncover the elements of graphic design in cinema by exploring artists and examples that exhibit great design.
